front.title: Diameter Application for Authentication and Authorization in Web Applications

abstract.t: This document specifies the Diameter Application for Authenticationand Authorization in Web Applications (Diameter WebAuth). ThisDiameter application is intended to be used by Diameter clients toperform authentication and authorization operations with a Diameterserver in web-based environments. It provides facilities to allowweb sites to authenticate their web user clients using a number of(HTTP) authentication schemes. In addition, it supports userauthorization using dedicated service identifiers. Diameter WebAuthmay also be used by non web-based Diameter clients and servers thatrequire a lightweight authentication and authorization Diameterapplication.
